Headline: Green and Pink Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green & Pink Line trains are operating with residual delays after an earlier raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown. Service is resuming, allow extra time

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green and Pink Line trains are operating with residual delays after an earlier raised bridge at the Chicago River, downtown. 
 
Trains are moving and normal service is being restored. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary Reroute at Narragansett/North
ShortDescription: #86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ridgeland, North Ave, Austin, Grand: due to street blockage near Narragansett/North.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#86 Narragansett/Ridgeland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ridgeland, North Ave, Austin, Grand and the resume their normal route at  Narragansett, due to street blockage near Narragansett/North.

Allow extra travel time.
